metadata.synopsis: Rather than openly approaching the goblins/worgs near the windmill, a player snuck by and then gets spotted once they're near the windmill. Combat starts immediately.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the goblins after first sneaking near the windmill (e.g. around -1; 37; 424 in WLD_Main_A)

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *This fight could have been avoided, but now you've made it inevitable.*
0.context: NodeContext: Hostile. A pre-combat utterance potentially spoken by any goblin or worg at the windmill
